name: Wet Market
description: A market specializing in fresh fish, seafood, and aquatic products; adventurers can purchase fresh catches, learn about local fishing traditions, or find rare sea creatures.
atmosphere: The market has a fresh, maritime atmosphere with the scent of saltwater and fresh fish and the sound of fishmongers calling out their daily catches and the rustle of aquatic products being examined. The air carries the promise of fresh seafood and the essential nature of maritime commerce, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of daily fishing culture and the excitement of discovering rare sea creatures and exotic aquatic products.
